ProjectTitle: Molecular Epidemiology of tuberculosis at Human-Animal interface in the pastoral areas of Ethiopia with subsequent development of improved diagnostic approach
InitialFeedbackHistory:
23/10/2024
Ethics: You mention ethical approval obtained in Ethiopia, however, since this a partner institution outside the European Union, please ensure that these studies are also reviewed at KU Leuven (or another European institution) for more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/cmt-guidance and https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics. Please upload a revised DMP after obtaining approval numbers. 
Sharing: please avoid using freeware such as wetransfer since these are not very secure, for filetransfer you can use belnet filesender (https://filesender.belnet.be/)
